title: purposes of section 10(1) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act 2019
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Migration of Participating
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Migration of Participating 

Securities Act 2019 (Prescribed Form) (Section 10) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 29th day of January

title: purposes of section 10(1) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act 2019
purposes of section 10(1) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act 2019
heading: 2. The form (Form B90), set out in the Schedule, is prescribed for the
text_raw:
2. The form (Form B90), set out in the Schedule, is prescribed for the 
purposes of section 10(1) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act 2019 
(No.50 of 2019). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th February, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [27] 3
text_norm: 2 form (form b90) set schedule prescribed purpose section 10(1) migration participating security act 2019 (no.50 2019) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 4th february 2020 27 3

title: purposes of section 10(1) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act 2019
heading: SCHEDULE
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

 
 4 [27] 

General This form must be completed correctly, in full and in accordance with 
the following notes 

note one This form must be certified by a director or the secretary of the 
company. This form is a declaration of compliance with all the legal 
requirements relating to the Migration of Participating Securities Act 2019. 
It is a criminal offence pursuant to section 876 of the Companies Act 
2014 for a person to knowingly or recklessly deliver a document to the CRO 
which is false in a material particular. 

note two This section must be completed by the person who is presenting 
Form B90 to the CRO. This may be either the applicant or a person on his/her 
behalf. 

note three In accordance with section 10(2) of the Migration of Participating 
Securities Act 2019 the filing of this form shall be accompanied by an affidavit 
sworn by one or more of the Directors of the participating issuer verifying the 
statement contained herein. This affidavit will be visible on the company 
register. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [27] 5 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 January, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [27]
